body_html: My previous question applies equally to custom kernels. By current kernels, if you mean kernels that are part of core, then sure, all of them have a bazel dependency of protos_cc. But that doesn't mean they are really using any from protos_cc. Custom kernels are supposed to build with just the headers in framework_headers_lib. Have you tried building with just that dependency?

body: My previous question applies equally to custom kernels. By current kernels, if you mean kernels that are part of core, then sure, all of them have a `bazel` dependency of `protos_cc`. But that doesn't mean they are really using any from `protos_cc`. Custom kernels are supposed to build with just the headers in `framework_headers_lib`. Have you tried building with just that dependency?
